        public void addStage(java.lang.String name,
                     javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        Add a new stage into this StageManager
        参数:
        name - name of this new Stage

        get the stage with respond to given name
        参数:
        name - the name of the Stage to get
        返回:
        the wanting Stage

      • showStage

        public void showStage(java.lang.String name)

      • switchStage

        public void switchStage(java.lang.String oldPage,
                        java.lang.String newPage)
        Hide the old stage, and show the new stage
        参数:
        oldPage - name of the old Stage
        newPage - name of the new Stage

      • hideStage

        public void hideStage(java.lang.String name)
        Hide the stage with respond to given name
        参数:
        name - name of the stage to close

      • hideAllStage

        public void hideAllStage()
        Hide all stages in the hashmap

      • closeStage

        public boolean closeStage(java.lang.String name)
        Unload the stage response to given stage name, remove it from the hashmap
        参数:
        name - name of the stage to unload
        返回:
        true if successfully removed, false if no such a stage to remove
